Title: Engineer's Note
Text:
To Cheng:
I got through the problem reported by the new watchman.
Just as you said, the elevator running without a payload is not at all paranormal. It's simply that someone has lowered the weight sensing threshold of the elevator. Now, even a few grains of sand can keep this machine going up and down endlessly. I don't like to criticize people but young guys nowadays are just so doubtful about everything...
Nevertheless, we need your help for the reparing here. Only you have access to the system initialization.
